article.headline: Biden wonât travel to Milwaukee to accept Democratic nomination: AP source
article.body: Democratic presidential candidate Joe Biden will not travel to Milwaukee to accept his partyâs White House nomination because of concerns over the coronavirus. Thatâs according to a Democrat with knowledge of the decision who spoke to the Associated Press on Wednesday on condition of anonymity to discuss planning. Former Vice President Joe Biden speaks at a July 28 campaign event at the William "Hicks" Anderson Community Center in Wilmington, Del. AP The move is the latest example of the pandemicâs sweeping effects on the 2020 presidential election and the latest blow to traditional party nominating conventions that historically have marked the start of fall general-election campaigns.
